From the brand

Tenmiro Led Lights

Dedicated to providing personalized and fun life experiences

Tenmiro committed to bringing colorful visual effects and unique home experience to families. Here, you can get RGB lights whose colors can beswitched at will , strip lights that guide the visual magic and dynamic sparkling lights. Tenmiro not only bring your home even life infinite daydream space, but also shock vitality. Come to Tenmiro, come to colorful home and life.

More Size

MULTIFUNCTIONAL LIGHT STRIPS: You can adjust the light strips brightness from 1% to 100% to suit the various places. LED strip lights have memory function. By the smart App, you can experience the timing function, 28 Dynamic modes, you can also DIY your unique color
EASY TO INSTALL: Fully equipped accessories, it comes with 50ft Led light strip, power adapter, Ir remote control, controller and instruction manual, no need for any other devices, simply stick the strip lights on clean, dry surface. start to enjoy strip lighting
MULTIPLE SCENES AVAILABLE: 50ft Led strip lights long enough, suitable for home decor, it can be used for decorating your bedroom, dining room, living room, kitchen, porch, cabinet, Christmas tree, bar. especially great for Holiday event decoration like Christmas, Halloween, party, birthday, new year, and more

TENMIRO Smart LED strip Lights

Humanized design.Intelligent APP offers you more joy.Vibrant, bright Led strip lights meet your need for colorful home decoration. Just a simple action, you can set these color changing lights according to your preference.

The LED strips are ideal for bedroom, kitchen, under cabinets, living rooms, TV backlighting, garden, balconies, patios, parties, holidays, or family events.

You can use virtually anywhere you want!

Led light color will change with the rhythm of the sound and music, dance with the strip lights！！

Color changing lights bring more fun to your party

Lights for bedroom can auto open/close at set time

LED light with easy adjustment of color and brightness

}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);

if (!input) {

Price: $39.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:04:06 UTC – Details)


Control your lights and appliances with a simple tap or by asking Siri. Or effortlessly set up schedules that put your appliances on autopilot, turning your floor lamps, dehumidifier and many other devices on and off independently of your iPhone or internet connection. With HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV as your home hub, you can also access your accessories on the go, control them automatically based on whether somebody is leaving or arriving home, and add automations that work with other HomeKit-enabled accessories. Eve Energy lets you keep watch the energy your accessories are consuming and shows you how much they’re going to cost based on your entered electricity rate. Eve Energy supports Bluetooth and Thread, and joins your Thread network automatically. As a router node, Eve Energy relays other Thread accessories’ data packages and enhances the stability and reach of your smart home. Equipped with Apple HomeKit technology and UL certification, Eve Energy offers outstanding ease of use and advanced security. Eve Energy is quick & easy to set up, and you don’t need a bridge. And the best thing about all Eve accessories is how they protect your privacy: Eve does not harvest your personal data and there is no Eve cloud, so your data won’t get exposed. Local intelligence means all the processing is done locally and Eve accessories communicate directly with your iPhone, iPad, or home hub without any cloud dependency or bridge.
Eve Energy requires iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS
Turn lights and appliances on and off via app, Siri or built-in button; Effortlessly set up schedules to automatically switch devices – independently of your iPhone and home network
Control your appliances on the go or based on presence via a home hub (HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV)
Track power consumption and see the projected cost based on your electricity rate
Joins your Thread network automatically (supports Bluetooth and Thread), and as a router node the accessory enhances the stability and reach of your smart home; HomeKit-enabled for unparalleled ease of use and advanced security; get up and running in a flash with quick & easy set up and no need for a bridge or gateway; UL-certified
100% Privacy: No Eve cloud, no registration, no tracking. Local intelligence and direct communication without bridge or cloud dependency.

The Smart Plug & Power Meter is Thread-enabled.


Easy ways to make your home smart.

Turn lights and appliances on and off via app, Siri or built-in button. Or effortlessly set up schedules that put your appliances on autopilot, turning your floor lamps, dehumidifier and many other devices on and off independently of your iPhone or internet connection. With HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV as your home hub, you can also access your accessories on the go, control them automatically based on whether somebody is leaving or arriving home, and add automations that work with other HomeKit-enabled accessories.

Good to know:

  • Track power consumption and see the projected cost based on your electricity rate
  • Quick & easy set up and no need for a bridge or gateway / UL-certified
  • Joins your Thread network automatically, and as a router node the accessory enhances the stability and reach of your smart home / supports Bluetooth and Thread
  • Apple HomeKit-enabled for outstanding ease of use and advanced security
  • 100% Privacy: No Eve cloud, no registration, no tracking. Local intelligence and direct communication without bridge or cloud dependency.

Requirements: iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS; Controlling this HomeKit-enabled accessory automatically and away from home requires a HomePod or an Apple TV (4th generation or later) as a home hub

Power: Input / Output: AC 120 V, 60 Hz, max. 15 A / 1,800 W

Compatibility: Type B sockets, Type A & B appliances

Wireless Connection: Bluetooth, Thread

Dimensions: 2.8 x 1.5 x 2.4 in


Talk or tap to control your home.

Already made yourself comfortable? Hands tied? Turn your devices on and off with a simple tap or by asking Siri. You can also control Eve Energy directly via the built-in switch, which you can protect against curious fingers by activating the child lock.

Control your connected devices from anywhere – whether you’re strolling around the block or exploring the world. Your home hub (HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV) will keep you connected to your abode.




Put your appliances on autopilot.

Schedules enable you to automate lights, humidifiers, fans and other vital devices. You can then get on with your business while your accessories get on with theirs – all without the need for a home hub and independently of your iPhone or internet connection.

You could have a floor lamp turn on at sunset even if you’re not at home – that’s not only convenient, but also reassuring.

Automations and HomeKit scenes.

Automations seamlessly connect your HomeKit-enabled accessories. Have a light turn on as soon as the Eve Motion wireless motion sensor detects any movement. Or switch your appliances on and off based on whether someone is leaving or arriving home – and save precious power. As soon as the last person leaves home, all the lights and appliances will turn off automatically.

Combine multiple HomeKit-enabled accessories in a single scene and save yourself the hassle of running to and fro. A “Good Night” scene can turn on your bedside lamps, shut your shades and switch off all the other lights in your home with a single voice command.

Watch those Watts.

Curiosity. Costs. Conservation – reasons to monitor your power consumption and projected cost are aplenty. Eve Energy gives you the insight to embrace yours – and gain a complete overview by entering your electricity rate.

Read more


Robust smart home, with a big future ahead.

Eve Energy supports Bluetooth and Thread, and joins your Thread network automatically. As a router node, Eve Energy relays other Thread accessories’ data packages and enhances the stability and reach of your smart home. Thread is also a pillar of Matter – the smart home standard of the future.

Eve Energy Eve Light Switch Eve Motion Eve Room Eve Door & Window Eve Aqua
Description Smart Plug & Power Meter Connected Wall Switch Wireless Motion Sensor Indoor Air Quality Monitor Wireless Contact Sensor Smart Water Controller
Features Built-in schedules, power meter, onboard power button Capacitive touch panel, status LED, Single-pole & 3-way Indoor/outdoor, infrared sensor with 120º field of view, 30 ft max range, 2-second reaction time, IPX3 water resistance Precision VOC, temperature & humidity sensors, e-ink display, built-in rechargeable battery, aluminum frame Discreet design, included mounting spacers Built-in schedules, auto shut-off, onboard control button, aluminum frame, IPX4 water resistance, UV protection, child lock
Direct Connection (No Bridge Necessary) Switch on/off a lamp, fan, etc. via app or Siri, set schedules Make regular hardwired lights smart, switch on/off via app, Siri or direct touch Trigger HomeKit-enabled accessories & scenes via presence (Apple home hub recommended) View indoor air quality & comfort levels, record measurements Check the open/closed status of a door or window, record activity Control a sprinkler via app or Siri, set schedules, track estimated water usage
With Home Hub (Apple TV or HomePod) Control while away from home, automate Control while away from home, automate Get motion detection notifications while away from home, trigger automations View measurements while away from home, trigger automations Get activity notifications while away from home, trigger automations Water garden while away from home, automate
Works great in scenes & automations with: Eve Motion, Eve Door & Window, Eve Room, Eve Light Strip, Eve Flare, Eve Light Switch Eve Energy, Eve Light Strip, Eve Flare Eve Energy, Eve Light Strip, Eve Flare, Eve Light Switch Eve Energy Eve Energy Eve Weather
Specifications Type B sockets, Type A & B appliances Input: AC 120 V, 50/60 Hz; requires a neutral wire; replaces a single-pole or 3-way switch; only for use with copper / copper clad wire in dry, indoor locations 2 seconds reaction time, field of view: 120, distance: 30 ft. max at 6.5 ft. mounting height, 0°F – 130°F), IPX3 water resistance Operating Range: 32°F – 122°F, 5% – 95% humidity, Accuracy: Typical ± 0.54°F Typical ± 3% humidity, Display: E-ink ~ 200 x 200 pixels Easy DIY installation, Self-adhesive, completely wireless, long lasting battery Thread: ¾ in; Operating Range: Pressure: Min 1 bar / 14.5 psi – Max 5 bar / 72.5 psi, Water Resistance, UV Protection
Power Source Input / Output: AC 120 V, 60 Hz, max. 15 A / 1,800 W Min. 3 W; Max. 1800 W / 15 A (resistive); Max. 600 W / 5 A (incandescent / tungsten) 2x AA Replaceable Batteries Built-in micro USB-rechargeable battery: 6+ weeks 1x ER14250 Replaceable Battery 2x AA Replaceable Batteries
Wireless Connection Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread Bluetooth Low Energy Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread
Requirements iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS

item.title: LB3 Smart Lamp, LED Bedside Touch Lamps Compatible with Alexa and Google Home, App Go_sund Control, RGB Color Changing Dimmable & Warm White Night Light for Bedroom, USB Powered
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub requiredHands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:25:25 UTC – Details)



Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub required
Hands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home to free up your hands; You can switch on/off and even change the colors of your lamp by simple voice command. No worries about can’t find the light switch when you walk into a dark room.
Tap Top to Power on/off: The creative built-in touch sensor allows you to tap twice on the top of the lamp to turn it on or off. Manually work with the slide area to change brightness and colors. It is convenient to switch white and color modes with the front button directly
16 Million Colors and 8 Scenes: With 16 million colors, you can select any color in the spectrum via your phone App to create an atmosphere such as a romantic dinner or warm sleep. Scenes are able to be created for your desired ambiance, like multiple colors, 1% – 100% brightness, and color-changing speed.
Timer & Schedule: The smart lamp can be turned on or off automatically according to the time you set. Or set a schedule to turn off the lamp based on your family’s sleep schedule.

4
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:25:25 UTC – Details)

1【16 Color Sunset Light & 4 Flashing Modes】The sunset lamp projector build-in RGB led, 16 kinds of light effect and 4 dynamic modes(Flash/Strobe/Fade/Smooth Effect) to choose from, provides a comfortable and romantic atmosphere. There are so many choice, you would find one you like.Suitable for children’s rooms, bedrooms, creating a different sunset projector light atmosphere, let you enjoy your leisure time and your family.
2【Smart APP and Remote Control Sunset Lamp】This is a smart sunlight lamp, you can change color of light, adjust brightness of lamp, choose light mode of this sunset lamp projector to make it become a party light or night light through APP on the phone or the remote control; Super convenient and versatile!
3【Portable size Rotatable and Adjustable】The lamp tripod can be rotated and adjusted.The Sunset Lamp head can be rotated 360 degrees, By changing the rotation angle and distance of the illuminator, different circular lights can be emitted from different angles, thereby bringing different effects. The farther the distance is, the larger the projection projected on the wall or ceiling.
4【Widely USE】It is very suitable for use as a background for photos, live broadcast and Vlog video shooting, as well as decoration for bedrooms, living rooms, corridors, cafes, studios, theme restaurants, bars, etc. At the same time, it is also very suitable for occasions such as dating, marriage proposal, parties, birthdays, family celebrations, garden parties and so on.
5 【365 DayQuality Assurance】If you are not 100% satisfied with sunset lights, just contact us and we will refund or replace your product immediately. If you have any questions about our sunlamp, please contact us first, and our support team will try to help you solve all problems…

Voice Control: You can control your devices hands free, just give voice commands to turn on/off the connected devices. Compatible with Apple HomeKit, Apple Watch, Siri, Carplay, Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant.
Compact Size: Smart plug occupies only one socket, the device allows you to stack two mini smart plugs in the same outlet, which is convenient and practical.
Schedule: You can schedule connected home devices to turn on and off automatically by smart plugs. Save energy when lights are not needed or left on by accident. Sunrise and sunset setting are supported.
Quality: The mini plug is made of PC flame retardant material, and has been approved for safety and quality assurance. Certified by ETL and FCC, it supports home appliance up to 15A.

item.title: 12V Car Battery Tester, TOPDON BT20 Battery Load Tester, Voltage Test Digital Alternator Tester, Cranking&Charging Test via App, Budget Automotive Battery Analyzer&Checker for Car Truck SUV ATV Boat
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand TOPDON, Your Ideal Car Helper TOPDON BT20 Battery Tester 2022 Budget Car Battery Tester Basic function: voltage and load test Extra function(with APP): Cranking and Charging Test TOPDON-Your Helper in Diagnose Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.62 x 5.67 x 3.27 inches; 12.35 Ounces Item model number ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $35.99 - $26.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:45 UTC – Details)

From the brand

TOPDON, Your Ideal Car Helper

TOPDON BT20 Battery Tester

2022 Budget Car Battery Tester

Basic function: voltage and load test

Extra function(with APP): Cranking and Charging Test

TOPDON-Your Helper in Diagnose

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.62 x 5.67 x 3.27 inches; 12.35 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ TOPDON BT20 Car Battery Tester
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 5, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ TT TOPDON
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B5T7212M
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

【A Budget-Friendly Car Battery Tester】As a battery tester below 30 bucks, it features 4 testing modes: battery load tester (range 10V-20V), voltage test, cranking test, and charging test (alternator tester), the latter 2 test modes are availabe only with APP, offering you more value for the money. NOTE: For 12V lead-acid batteries. NOTE: It doesn’t measure CCA.
【Fast&Accurate Diagnosis within 1 Second】Simply click the TEST button, and get the testing results within 1 second. This battery tester will display the battery life by way of Low/Medium/High. Adopting the latest conductivity testing technology (up to 99.5% test accuracy). Thus, it makes a great choice for users who want to get results quickly. NOTE: It doesn’t measure CCA.
【Expanded Voltage, Cranking, and Charging Tests with APP】Easily connect to this car battery tester via Bluetooth to get additional cranking, charging, and voltage testing capabilities. Easily view real-time voltage waveform graphs with data playback functionality.
【Comprehensive Vehicle Coverage & Multi-Language Support】Plug & play operation. Simply connect the testing clamps to the battery and you are ready to analyze. This 12V battery tester works on a variety of vehicles with 12V Lead-acid batteries such as boats, motorcycles, ships, and trucks. Also this auto battery tester easily switches between 8 different languages.
【Ideal Car Tool for Every Car Owner】Reverse polarity and “no spark” protection for extra safety. Long 19.75″ clamp leads allow testing from inside or outside the vehicle. A perfect battery analyzer and load tester for small repair shops & car owners alike. Makes a great gift for car enthusiasts.
【8 HOUR TECH SUPPORT HOTLINE】TOPDON provides 2 Year Warranty for all products. In case of any inquiries, please feel free to contact us at 833-956-8335 Monday-Friday 9:00AM-6PM Eastern Time.

BT20 BATTERY LOAD TESTER

The BT20 is TOPDON’s entry-level wireless 12V battery tester. Offering load, voltage, charging, and cranking tests, the BT20 offers high-precision voltage detection and real-time voltage monitoring.

This easy-to-use device lets users of all skill-levels view voltage waveform graphs and test reports through an app. Test reports can be generated automatically, and easily share and save test reports. Data Playback function query battery voltage history data, help users analyze the problem by playing back charge and discharge data reports.

Its load test method provides accurate results, making the BT20 a battery tester with superb cost-effectiveness.

Quick access to test results in the app by linking your phone via Bluetooth.

Run Charging Tests: Test a battery’s charging performance with the app and analyze the results.

Run Cranking Tests: Test the battery through the load of the car itself, and view the results in the app.

Voltage Test:

Further analyze the battery’s health through its voltage, and predict the battery’s power status with the results of the BT20. Three kinds of indicator lights communicate the battery level, full, medium, and low.

Load Test:

Built-in load modules help determine the status of the battery.

Multi-Dimensional Display of Battery Status

No-load and load voltage readings can be displayed in the APP, and there is a real-time voltage waveform graph for accurate monitoring.

Battery Load Test

The BT20 applies load tests and monitors the voltage response of the battery. Users gain a clearer look at the actual remaining battery capacity.

Battery Voltage Test

Once the clamps are connected to the terminals, the BT20 delivers the battery voltage results in the blink of an eye.

Cranking Test

The cranking test measures the battery’s cranking voltage and cranking time when starting up. Normally, the cranking voltage should be above 9.6V. As for the cranking time, The shorter, the better!

Read more

Charging Test

The charging test measures the no-load voltage and load voltage, which helps you to understand the battery charging status, and alternator performance.

Supports 8 Languages to Maximize Utility

English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese

A Wide Range of Tests with Highly Accurate Results

The BT20 is designed for versatility. With a variety of testing capabilities, analysis tools, and a battery range of 5 to 20 volts, the tool delivers highly accurate result.

Read more

4.5
Price: $35.99 - $26.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:45 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:38:36 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Easy to install. Scan, Plug and Play. Full installation and setup in less than 10 minutes
Protected and informed, with Realtime phone app notifications, emails, SMS messages and automations (turn on optional sirens, smart plugs..)
FAIL/SAFE: Patented technology! Pair your leak sensors to battery powered valve controllers and/or sirens. No internet, no WiFi, power outage no worries!
Latest Wireless Technology LoRa: low-power consumption (5+ year battery life) and “Longest Range, by Far!” (1/4 mile, open air)
Whole house smart home solution: Your YoLink leak detection system is part of a complete product line, including smart wireless automatic water shut-off and a full smart home solution, including security, locks, plugs & switches, temperature, humidity, and smoke/CO sensors, and more
Requirements – Android or iOS smartphone, wired ethernet port or WiFi connection. App is always free, with 5 free texts per device, plus 5, per month.

INTRODUCTION:

  • YoLink Hub & Water Leak Sensors (see listing details for quantity)
  • The Hub connects your YoLink devices to the Internet and to the user-friendly YoLink app, and is the central controller for your YoLink wireless home automation system

FEATURES:

  • Wi-Fi (2.4 GHz only) or wired network connection options YoLink’s industry-leading long range communication (up to ¼ mile open air) based on LoRa long range technology

BENEFITS:

  • Very easy plug & play initial set-up – no special network or computer knowledge required. Simply plug the included Ethernet patch cord into an available working network port on your router (suggested) or use a 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi connection and be up and running in moments
  • While many smart home devices rely on the home Wi-Fi system and may crowd your network or harm your Wi-Fi performance, the YoLink devices communicate with the Hub via the proprietary YoLink Protocol at the 923.3 MHz frequency (only your Hub connects to the Wi-Fi/network and Internet)
  • Homes with devices on Wi-Fi, or other protocols, with access to the Internet, are each, individual, potential safety, privacy, and security risks. Acting as the internet gateway the YoLink Hub connects your YoLink devices to the internet via one encrypted connection, providing safety and security for your network and home

REQUIREMENTS:

  • Router with 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Or router with an available Ethernet port (patch cord is included) Smartphone or tablet running iOS 9 or higher, Android 4.4 or higher Tools Required: None (Hub may optionally be wall-mounted. Refer to the Installation & User Guide for more information) Installation Difficulty Level: Moderately Easy

TECHNICAL SPECS:

  • Semtech LoRa RF Module YL09 microcontroller with 32-Bit RISC processor Frequency, LoRa: 923.3 MHz Frequency, Wi-Fi: 2412 – 2462 MHz Color: White Dimensions [L x W x D]: 4.33 x 4.33 x 1.06 inches (110 x 110 x 27 mm) Status LEDs (Top):
  • Green power indicator Red feature indicator Blue Internet indicator
  • Ethernet Status Indicators (Rear)
  • Green network speed indicator Yellow network speed indicator
  • Set button (Rear) Network connector: RJ45 Power connector: Micro-USB B Power: 5 Volts DC
  • Environmental: Operating Temperature Range: -4°F – 104°F (-20°C – 50°C) Operating Humidity Range: ≤ 90% non-condensing Intended for indoor use only

PACKAGE CONTENTS:

  • (1) YoLink Hub (1) USB cable (1) Ethernet patch cable (1) AC/DC plug-in power supply (1) Quick start guide
  • YoLink Water Leak Sensors (see listing details for quantity)

item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:50 UTC – Details)

Product Description

SwitchBot Plug Mini to some may look a little ordinary, but there’s more to it than that. We looked to make a plug that focused more on what happens on the inside. Plug Mini includes 3 amazing chips, one for Wi-Fi functionality, one for Bluetooth connections, and a power consumption chip.

Even more reliable

No Hub required, with the choice between Bluetooth or Wi-Fi to connect. ETL listed.

Please note: you can only add Plug Mini to our app when using a 2.4Ghz Wi-fi connection. Once added, you can then use Bluetooth.

Control from anywhere

Thanks to our 3 all-new built-in performance chips, you can now control Plug Mini however you want, and whenever you want.

Monitor Energy and Save Big

You can now view your energy consumption data on the go, thanks to intuitive app graphs and breakdowns that let you see exactly where your home energy is being used.

Check up on Appliances in Seconds

You can quickly see the status of appliances and turn them on or off should you need to.

A plug you can count on

Plug Mini is built to protect, with a fire-resistant cover, overload protection and a safety-based shutter design you’ll be able to enjoy more peace of mind when charging appliances.

Keep this device dry and away from hot, humid, and/or other extreme environments.

Made to be non-intrusive

SwitchBot Plug Mini is designed to fit in anywhere discreetly and has minimal impact on your home no matter where you plug it in.

Your First Step to a Better Home Protects against overcharging

Set automated scenes to help stop smartphone device charging when your battery reaches a certain percent.

Turns on fans when Meter detects high temperature

Helps keep your environment comfortable depending on your needs.

Helps activate home appliances automatically

Automates devices so you can focus more on what matters.

Your first step to a better home

Use with SwitchBot Ecosystem and integrate Plug Mini with other SwitchBot products for an even more seamless smart home life.

Integrate Plug Mini with other appliances for an even more seamless smart home life.

Even more ways to control

You can control our products using a variety of methods.

1 SwitchBot Remote Control 2 SwitchBot NFC Tag Control 3 Apple Watch Control 4 App Control 5 Voice Control

Make Your Appliances Smart – Plug your existing appliances to this smart plug, and get ready to enjoy upgraded smart appliances. This WiFi plug allow you control your home devices remotely anytime anywhere (only supports 2.4Ghz WiFi). Enjoy the convenience of smart life!
Alexa Plug & Timer Plug – Free your hands with this smart plug when connect it with Alexa, Google Assistant, Siri Shorcuts, and Smartthings. You can also set timers to avoid energy waste for lamps, fans, or humidifiers.
Energy Consumption Monitoring – Monitor every consumption of your plug-in devices by checking the data through the app. The consumption data can also be exported in a document.
Easy to Set up & Friendly Design – Plug in, open the app, you can get started in minutes. Space-saving design fits into almost any electrical outlet without blocking other sockets.
Safe & Reliable & ETL Listed – The advanced V-0 flame retardant material and technique ensure your home safety. Overload protection feature gives you a chance of a second thought about using appliances with high wattage appliances. Please keep this device dry and away from hot, humid, and/or other extreme environments as this may cause accidents such as fire, burns, injury, electric shock and so on.

A plug you can count on

From the brand

Make life better by controlling everything in the palm of your hand. From intuitive lights to automated home devices, our smart products lineup elevates moods, moments, and beyond.

Top-tier quality made accessible for any home.

Smart Devices

For the Planet

Part of our mission is to make homes safer, cozier, and happier to live in. And that includes our biggest home – the planet.

That’s why we’ve made sure every Vont product comes with a link to an online instruction manual, so your devices are always ready to make life easier, right out of the box.

DRIVE IN A GALAXY OF COLOR LIGHTS | CUSTOMIZE YOUR CAR – Choose from 16 million colors and 30 unique scene modes. DIY effects, adjust brightness, and personalize this RGB LED strip to transform your daily drives into vibrant road trips.
QUICK SETUP | EASY CONTROL W/ VONT HOME APP – Just plug it in, power on, and lay out the 21-feet, single-design strip light suitable for various car models. Secure with the cable ties/stickers included and wirelessly control with the app or via a convenient controller.
﻿LIGHTS JAM W/ YOUR FAVORITE BEATS | ENJOY MUSIC MODE – Vont Car Lights built-in mic syncs with your car’s music in real-time, letting you experience a colorful car karaoke with your favorite beats.
﻿SAFE TO USE & WATER-RESISTANT – The interior strip light’s robust built comes with safety features to make you feel extra secure. It’s flame retardant, water-resistant, has a high-temp resistance, and is harmless to kids.
﻿24/7 CUSTOMER CARE & LIFETIME WARRANTY – Covered for life, it’s warranted against loss, theft, and defects in materials and workmanship as long as you own your car lights. Vont Customer Satisfaction Wizards are with you 24/7 – for life.

Vont Smart Car Strip Light’s sophisticated engineering makes sure you always feel secure with its safety features. Rated with IP20 (only for indoor use), it’s water-resistant, flame retardant, and super-safe to touch.

Activate Rhythmic Roadtrips

Color lights are one thing, but having lights that dance to the beat of your music is beyond everyday driving. Activate Music Mode and witness your strip lights sync with your car’s music and unbreakable car karaoke.

Four Mighty Light Strips

From the brand

At Meross, we create products that empower people’s lives. We believe in making homes smarter and people’s lives easier. We believe everyone deserves a smart life, and it should be simple, smart, and stable.

Smart Plugs Support Homekit

Outdoor Plugs Support Homekit

Smart Power Strip & Smart Plug

Smart Bulbs

Smart LED Strip Lights

Remote Control: To enable HomeKit remote control, you need a HomePod, an Apple TV 4K, Apple TV HD, or an iPad. Set any of these Apple devices in your house as a HomeKit bridge and connect it to your home 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network. Keep in mind that once your HomeKit bridge is set up, it has to be kept online. If it is powered off or disconnected from the Wi-Fi, it will fail to respond when you intend to control the device remotely.
Voice Control: You can control your devices hands free, just give voice commands to turn on/off the connected devices. Compatible with Apple HomeKit, Apple Watch, Siri, Carplay, Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant.
Compact Size: Smart plug occupies only one socket, the device allows you to stack two mini smart plugs in the same outlet, which is convenient and practical.
Schedule: You can schedule connected devices to turn on and off automatically by smart plugs. Save energy when lights are not needed or left on by accident. Sunrise and sunset setting are supported.
Quality: Smart outlet is made of PC flame retardant material, and has been approved for safety and quality assurance. Certified by ETL and FCC, it supports home appliance up to 15A.

Previous page

    Integrate your device easily into your Apple ecosystem for even more convenient ways to control it.
